exercise.rubric: Listen and repeat. When you repeat, stress the words and syllables in CAPITALS.

question.sentence: Her hands were as cold as ice after skiing.

chain.text: her HANDS were as COLD as ICE after SKIing.

question.sentence: Nicole's sister isn't as pretty as her.

chain.text: niCOLE'S SISter ISn't as PREtty as HER.

question.sentence: My eyes aren't as good as yours.

chain.text: MY EYES AREN'T as GOOD as YOURS.

question.sentence: Jenny's hands aren't as small as Cassie's.

chain.text: JENny's HANDS AREN'T as SMALL as CASsie's.

question.sentence: She's as beautiful as her cousin.

chain.text: she's as BEAUtiful as her COUsin.

question.sentence: Her bag isn't as heavy as mine.

chain.text: HER BAG ISn't as HEAvy as MINE.

question.sentence: He was as quiet as she was.

chain.text: HE was as QUIET as SHE WAS.

question.sentence: I think they're as excited as we are.

chain.text: i think THEY're as exCITed as WE ARE.
